titleInfo.title: Plan of lots A.B.C.D.E.F. and of lots G, H, I, J, K, (south side of canal), at Burlington Beach, Saltfleet Township.

physicalDescription.note: 1 map : colour ; 38 x 70 cm, on sheet 50 x 79 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso.

mods.note: "Scale - 50 Feet to the Inch." At head of title in blue ink, "Curtis Survey." Includes "Surveyor's certificate" signed by "Ernest G. Barrow, Ontario Land Surveyor [and] dated 24th July 1895", "Owners' certificate" and "Affidavit of owners." "City Survey (Registered.)" is written on the left side of the sheet. Shows Beach Road [now Beach Boulevard]. The Grand Trunk Railway and government reserve land, framed by Lake Ontario, the Burlington Canal and Burlington Bay.
